SourceAnalyzer.Name: Bashwork Ordering Rules
SourceAnalyzer.Description: Custom ordering rules for Bashwork C# coding standards.

Rule.Name: ChildElementsMustFollowOrder
Rule.Context: When at the same scope level, {0} must be declared before {1}.
Rule.Description: To improve maintainability, the elements of any unit should be declared in a consistent order. This is covered in C# Coding Standards 2.5.2 and 2.5.3.
